name: unijobapp_api
description: This project contains the backend data processing, storing mechanisms, and logic for the UniJobApplication.

scripts.docker-script: docker exec unijobapp_api_node npm run script
scripts.match: docker exec unijobapp_api_node npm run script -- ./modules/matching/commands/MatchAllCommand
scripts.email: docker exec unijobapp_api_node npm run script -- ./modules/matching/commands/EmailMatchesCommand
scripts.refresh-database: docker exec unijobapp_api_node sh -c "npm run script -- ../database/database-delete && npm run script -- ../database/database-seed"
scripts.seed-database: docker exec unijobapp_api_node npm run script -- ../database/seed/matching-seeder
scripts.test:int: docker exec unijobapp_api_node npx jest --forceExit --verbose -c jest.integration.config.js
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:int && npm run refresh-database

author: Jack Watson
